name: Brawl
description:
The Open Source Mass Brawl Simulator! 
 
Brawl is a game about intense action with super realistic physics. You have to lead your gang to victory in a crime-infected town. 
 
You have to improve your fighting skills continuously, learn to block attacks, punch or kick with the correct timing. Watch your health and energy state. You can pick up fainted opponents/friends and use guns. 
 
FEATURES 
 
Intense action 
Fluid animation 
6 different scenes 
Responsive controls 
Dozens of buddies and enemies 
Brawl is open-source, feel free to learn how to write muti-platform C games here : https://github.com/milgra/brawl

name: Old Monastery Escape
description:
You need a place where you can stay. You don't have enough money to rent an apartment or book a hotel room. There is no safer place that you can think of than the monastery. That is where you grew up so that is the first place that you thought about. So, you went there with your back pack. However, you didn't see what you want to see. There are no people in the monastery. Seems like they moved out or something. The monastery looks so old to what you can remember. You went inside the place to reminisce the good times and who knows, maybe there is a clue about where they move. But now that you can't get out, looks like you have to find hints that can help you to unlock the door. 
 
The good news is, there are items in the room that you can use as an escape too. But even with that you still have to use your logic to escape. Old Monastery Escape is the newest room escape game by Ainars for Escape Fan. Play this exciting point n' click escape game and try to escape as fast as you can. Good luck!

name: Warface: Chernobyl
description:
As part of the new special operation, Warface operatives will visit Pripyat - one of the most mysterious and historically significant places on Earth. According to intelligence reported to the Warface headquarters, there is increased seismic activity in this region. It is the players' task is to investigate what is happening in the region and to confirm if the instability is related to the activities of the evil Blackwood organization that have been seen around the city.

"Pripyat" introduces new mechanics to be aware of in combat, such as the energy shields that will be used by individual enemies and defensive installations. Players need to ready themselves for the latest creation of Blackwood’s robotics department, called SED. These sinister humanlike androids will pose a serious threat to any squad making precise teamwork essential to bring them down!

name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
description: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade is a video game for the NES based on the 1989 action and adventure movie of the same name. In the game, the player controls protagonist Indiana Jones, going through levels taken directly from the film, albeit with a shortened and simplified plot.

name: Deeeer Simulator
description: Put simply, Deeeer Simulator is a “Slow-Life Town Destruction Game”. You can spend your days enjoying a nice, relaxed frolic here and there together with the other animals around town, or you can choose to relieve some stress and absolutely destroy the town and everything in it.

name: Vasara Collection
description:
For the very first time, highly acclaimed Japanese Arcade Shoot’em Ups: Vasara and Vasara 2 are made available to the whole world via this package: Vasara Collection!

Science Fiction meets History in these arcade classics which take place in an alternate timeline Feudal Japan where technologically advanced weaponry and equipment are a reality, and heroes use flying motorcycles with amazing firepower and fierce melee weapons to destroy their enemies.

name: Cities: Skylines - Mayor's Edition
description:
Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation genre. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience. From the makers of the Cities in Motion franchise, the game boasts a fully realized transport system. It also includes the ability to mod the game to suit your play style as a fine counter balance to the layered and challenging simulation. You're only limited by your imagination, so take control and reach for the sky!

Cities: Skylines - Mayor's Edition Edition has everything console players need to take their city-building skills to new heights. Along with the base game, this bundle features some of the game's most popular content add-ons, including all the content from Season Pass 1, and everything to come throughout 2019 with Season Pass 2.

name: Dr. Mario World
description:
Use your puzzle skills to eliminate pesky viruses!
Match capsules with viruses and watch them disappear! Simply match three objects of the same color vertically or horizontally to clear them.
Take your time, because each puzzling configuration of viruses must be cleared using a limited number of capsules.

name: Cortex
description: Cortex is a little puzzle game containing over 200 levels!

name: Cuthbert in the Jungle
description: Poor Cuthbert is in trouble again. He failed to overcome the Moronians (See Cuthbert Goes Walkabout and Cuthbert Goes Digging), so he has been sent to the jungle, where his troubles are many. He must fight his way through the jungle collecting treasures, jumping pits and swinging across alligators whilst being aware of the killer scorpion in the basement. High speed arcade action game. Full colour graphics. Machine Code. Joystick required.

name: Alita: Battle Angel - The Game
description:
Under the shadow of the last great city in the sky, prepare to set off through the streets of Iron City and get ready for an epic adventure six-hundred years in the making…

Alita: Battle Angel - The Game is the official game based on the all-new theatrical film produced by James Cameron and Jon Landau and directed by Robert Rodriguez. It’s a high-octane cyberpunk MMORPG mobile game that allows players to experience all the action, emotion, locations, weapons, and characters from the movie!

Lost in the labyrinthine streets of Iron City, join forces with the heroine Alita, cyborg jacker Hugo and their friends in an effort to stop the power-hungry forces of The Factory.

Alita: Battle Angel – The Game provides both PvE and PVP game modes alongside an innovative gameplay narrative told within the story of the Alita movie! Enhance your character with cyborg upgrades, gather your crew and hit the streets – Alita: Battle Angel – The Game is waiting!

Features:
PVE and PVP Gameplay
- Face a variety of challenges, and gameplay modes from the movie.

Personalized Outfits
- Choose from numerous weapons, gear and cybernetic upgrades to customize the look of your player character.

Powerful Hunter Warriors
- Hunter Warriors are the police and bounty hunters of Iron City and can be hired to assist you in battle. Team up and choose your tactics wisely so you can bring down the mightiest enemies.

Stunning graphics and special effects
- With stunning, high-quality action and graphics – this game is built to showcase the incredible detail, depth and scale of the world of Alita Battle Angel.

As Alita would say — “Do not stand by, in the presence of Evil!” Join players around the world as you prepare for the battle of your lives!

name: The Return: Survival
description:
The Return: Survival is an action packed Co-Op shooter for up to four players with dinosaurs and a lot of badass weapons. Can you survive the green hell?
If you are brave enough, explore the deadly island and stand your ground in 2 different epic modes and a great pool of different maps against hordes of blood thirsty dinosaurs, like the Velociraptor or the T-Rex.
You can choose one of four classes with three unique and powerful abilities to defend yourself and your team mates against any giant lizard.
Hunt those dinosaurs, earn cash and buy yourself better equipment to make sure to survive. To achieve that goal, you can use a wide range of different SMG's, MG's, Sniper Rifles, Rocketlaunchers, Grenadelaunchers and even Flamethrower.

name: Farragnarok
description: Farragnarok's first land, LOHAE is a peaceful tree growing idle game, at first. Most of the game happens underground, and it can take players hours to realize that while they have been growing trees on the surface, something sinister is happening in the roots.

name: The Story of My Life
description: The Story of My Life is a kinetic visual novel that explores the life of Noah. From his tween years into young adulthood, dealing with love, loss, and his mental health.

name: Autumn's Journey
description:
The world of Ishtera is populated by two races: dragonkind, who have lived there for eons, and the heavenkind, who have recently appeared.

Auralee, an aspiring knight from the farming town of Berri, stumbles upon something unexpected during one of her patrols. After a rather inelegant introduction, Kerr states he's really an Earth Dragon. Whether he likes it or not, Auralee is now involved in his mission to regain his dragon form. Along with some help by a fellow dragonkind named Ilmari, their journey begins...

name: Blazing Sails
description:
In Blazing Sails you, your ship and crew have to battle other teams on a huge map of land and sea until one team survives.

As a battle hardened pirate you have to fulfill different tasks on your ship like steering the ship, deploying the sails, repairing ship damage and firing the cannons to crush your enemy’s. You’ll also be forced to go on land to gather different resources, weapons and ammo. But be careful to not abandon ship completely! If your ship goes down, your team goes down with it.

name: Hero Emblems II
description:
A mobile RPG adventure game that uses a match-3 system for battles.

The game was shown at Tokyo Game Show 2016 with a planned release in 2017 but has been delayed since with few development updates given on its progress, the last being in January 2019.
It is being developed by a 2 person indie team in Taiwan.

name: Deathbulge: Battle of the Bands
description: A role-playing game featuring musical themes with an affinity for the sick and righteous. The story revolves around a deadly battle of the bands contest, where entrants can attack and be attacked with music.

name: PlanetCon
description:
PlanetCon is a simple turn based strategy game, of galactic conquest, similar to Konquest for Linux. It can be played by 1 to 9 players, against AI adversaries controlled by the computer, or against other people in the same device. 
 
Players start with a planet that produces a number of ships each turn, and they can send fleets of ships in order to conquer other planets, with the final objective of conquering the whole galaxy, or to produce more ships than the opponents at the end of the last turn.

name: Data
description: You play as Obama the Lizard and go through puzzles to fight Mark and retrieve your data.

name: Groundhog Day: Like Father Like Son
description: In Groundhog Day: Like Father Like Son players assume the role of Phil Connors Jr., the son of Phil Connors from the iconic film, who returns to Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania only to become trapped in a time loop just as his father once was. Players will solve puzzles and explore the world introduced by the film as they try to break out of this time loop.

name: No Straight Roads
description: Welcome to Vinyl City! Play with Mayday and Zuke for the Musical Revolution in this action adventure game created by Wan Hazmer, one of the lead game designer of FF XV and Daim Dziauddin, SFV's concept artist.

name: Mega Miracle Force
description:
Idea Factory's 25th anniversary mobile game featuring characters from over 70 titles, including games by Compile Heart, developed by Zoo Corporation and Axel Corporation.
The game uses a 5 vs 5 strategy battle system on a 7 by 5 grid.

It is set in the Hyperdimension Neptunia world and some characters from different games can be fused together to create "Mega Miracle Characters".
An example used in the promotion for the game is Hirotune, a fusion between Spectral Force’s Hiro and the Neptunia series’ Neptune, shown at the end of the second trailer.

name: Hexagon Dungeon
description:
"Start your duel against Hexagon Dungeon monsters with a giving Slime!
It’s very easy to play. Place a new hexagon to a vacant space and link three to a new one. Then you will get level upgraded and summon a creature which will attack the Dungeon monsters.
Slime is a powerful soldier, but it has low HP. To become stronger, you can try to get more pets and take full advantage of the dungeon buildings. All of these will enforce you with unexpected powers.
Cow is one of the most challenged BOSS in the dungeon. Try to start a thrilling war against it and it will be epic! "

name: Hexagon Dungeon: The Arcana Stone
description: Sin descripción

name: Waiting Game
description:
Choose from 6 interesting "Things" and use your Evolution Dots to make them all evolve! But only the most patient ones have what it takes to unlock all 50 achievements! 
 
Turn long waits into a game! 
 
The Waiting Game was created to make waiting go faster. While waiting for a special event you can focus on your selected Thing evolving instead of getting frustrated by the wait.

name: Sea Horse Hide'n Seek
description: Sin descripción

name: Oddlly
description: The point of the game is to connect as much blocks as possible using swipe and destroy other blocks to get the highest score. Each block that connected to the pile increases pile's points exponantially.And if you manage to connect all the blocks of one kind you started with, score of that pile will be doubled.You can not destroy standalone blocks.Each level has a minimum score point you must reach in order to unlock the next level in challenge mode.As you progress in Challenge Mode,difficulty increases like limitations to the moves you can make gets restricted, e.g. only allowed to swipe up. Try it out,Have Fun!

name: Azusa RP Online
description: Azusa Online is an open world roleplay driven game, focused in developing the world and story of your character while interacting with other players. Compete in tournaments around the world to earn rights to wear the legendary Olympian armors and help defy gods; Athena, Hades, Zeus and Poseidon.

name: Citytopia
description: Welcome to Citytopia, an exciting city builder and management game with beautiful 3D graphics and an innovative needs-based objective system. Citizens need goods and work, factories want to create goods and employ workers, and stores are looking for goods and people to supply. Open card packs to build and upgrade all aspects of the city, from buildings to vehicles to the roads themselves. Master the supply chain to transform your city into a thriving metropolis!

name: Dakar Series: Desafío Ruta 40
description: The “Desafío Ruta 40 Rally” is part of the world-famous “Dakar Series”, a number of cross-country rallies and is the first event of this series to be added to Dakar 18. The race took place between August 27 and 31 2018 in Argentina. As with the main game the team at Bigmoon Entertainment focused all their effort on simulating this challenge to make it as realistic as possible. It will enhance the already existing world of the main game by additional 12.000 km² including five new stages around the beautiful country side of Argentina. To make sure players do not get lost in the challenging world, the DLC includes brand new road books – again based on the original materials handed out to the drivers during the event.

name: Tasty Town
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Legends
description:
Conquer with character in Apex Legends, a free-to-play Hero shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame & fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.

Master an ever-growing roster of diverse Legends, deep tactical squad play and bold new innovations that go beyond the Battle Royale experience—all within a rugged world where anything goes. Welcome to the next evolution of Hero Shooter.

name: Pumped BMX Pro
description: Developed by one man studio Yeah Us! Games, Pumped BMX Pro is the sequel to the hugely successful Pumped BMX +. The momentum-based BMX freestyler takes the action to the next level with a beautiful new look, a fresh new physics engine and more content than ever before!

name: Resort Boss: Golf
description: Unleash your inner tycoon and build your golf club from a one-hole course to a 5-star resort. Paint the land with luscious fairways, design world-class golf courses and manage staff to attract VIP golfers from all over the planet.

name: Pedal-Olli 3D
description: When every other extreme sport is not extreme enogh. Select your character and perform stunts to cause as much mayhem as possible in different levels.

name: TouHou Nil Soul
description: Scarlet Devil Mansion is asking for trouble again. For the sake of convenience, vampire lord Reimilia Scarlet release scarlet mist to blind the sun. No doubt such stupid behavior will definitely result in a tragedy. Look! Reimu and Marisa are coming to teach her a lesson.

name: Rise of the Pirates
description: Throw yourself into a world of fantasy and create your own character to embark on an epic high seas adventure of your own making. In the pursuit of power, riches and glory, from something as traditional as discovering buried treasure, to simply slaying man and beast alike, there is a path for everyone.

name: Torn Earth
description: Welcome to Torn Earth. An open world post apocalyptic adventure where choices matter and survival is key.

name: V.L.A.D.i.K
description: Explore the open world, go through different tasks, ride a car, hire people to your gang. All this adventure takes place in the beautiful distant expanses of Russia. Play as an ordinary guy named Vlad.

name: The Cup
description: The Cup is a fast-paced rogue-like dungeon crawler, where adventurers fight off hordes of enemies to find the ultimate prize, the Cup of Life. Can you fend off countless minions and slay the boss?

name: The Dungeon Paradox
description: A genre-defining phase-based tactical RPG

name: Funbag Fantasy
description: Develop a romantic relationship with a sexy succubus, a princess, a female knight, and a noble woman in a fantasy world of swords and magic! There are 5 endings to complete including a final true route.

name: Save Koch
description: You are local mafia kingpin, Jeffrey Koch. Your empire in New Kandinski is in total chaos because an unknown Mastermind has decided to take your place. And they’ve planted a sleeper Mole inside your operation. It’s time to act, but you need to act smart.

name: Terror of Hemasaurus
description: A retro city smash 'em up with satisfying destruction physics. Play as a Giant Monster unleashing terror upon mankind in this modern arcade experience with the action turned up to eleven.

name: Western Province
description: Western Province is a wild west-themed massively multiplayer sandbox game, with a focus on flexible play-styles and player interaction. Build a business empire, join a criminal gang, or form a law posse!

name: Under One Wing
description: Fairy Fight - A large-scale dogfight, utilizing the finest warplanes the world has ever known. Sasaki Junichi is the grandson of a legendary FF Pilot. He arrives at the student dormitory of a legendary FF academy known as Shouou Academy, only to find... every other tenant is a woman!!

name: SkyGameChanger-AirCombat II-
description: When you get irritated, get on the latest fighter XF - 98 and shoot a lot of missiles! This game is a game that enjoys aerial battles by riding the high durability air fighter XF - 98.

name: Blind Date
description: A dating game all about your conversational wits, a flurry of nerves and a universe of choices in between.

name: 9-nine-:Episode 1
description:
Izumi Tsubasu x Palette 14th project.

9-nine- Episode 1 is the first volume in a series of supernatural mystery games, with Episode 1 telling a story centered around Miyako Kujo. The entries in the the 9-nine- series share the same setting and world, but each entry focuses on a different heroine. 9-nine- is a tale of the town of Shiromitsugawa, host to mysterious Artifacts and the superpowers they bestow on their Users. A tale of growing trust and budding romance between the protagonist and the heroine, and also a murder mystery where they hunt down the culprit behind a series of supernatural murders. Each game has an independent story that can be enjoyed on its own.

name: Tether
description: With the Tether Tech Roller (TM) you can Swing, Roll, Jump and Glide at great speeds without any injury! Explore vast landscapes and compete in the Swingball Arena, as well as other magnificent game modes like: Osmo, Racing and Swingshot. Play together in Co-op and Split-screen locally or online. Get your Tether Tech Roller (TM) today!

name: Beat Blaster
description: Beat Blaster is a VR game of shooting, running and dodging where everything happens to the music rhythm. An original mix of styles where each game will offer you a new challenge.

name: One Hundred Times Me
description: Dive into abstract atmospheric world where your every move is recorded. Destroy your inner demons while your past selves try to stop you, but hurry up you only have 30 seconds. One Hundred Times Me is a game where you are your own greatest enemy.

name: Fearless Tigor
description: It is a fastly paced 2d action platformer game with the mixed of Castlevania and other classic games, followed by interesting puzzles. The aim of this game is to help Tigor in facing the center of earth’s harsh condition before reaching the Earth’s surface.

name: Homing Shapes
description: Dodge and evade the enemy's home-in projectiles whilst you destroy them! Your targeting is automatic and in specific order.

name: Her 2: I Want to See You Again
description: This is a antique style game with TCG & LVG ,you need to carry out the character training of heroine in 6 years and finish all the plots. There are 16 endings.

name: Chaos Village
description: Chaos Village is a top-down chaotic shooter game with various weapons, perks and power ups.

name: Creepy Vision
description: Being held hostage by a mysterious dark dimension, the protagonist tries to escape his personal prison, which is quite adaptive to his thoughts and, therefore, actions.

name: Sakura no Mori Dreamers 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Commando Fodder: War Dogs
description: Commando Fodder: War Dogs is a traditional RTS, where you have to lead your platoon to victory by crushing the enemy using AK47's, rockets and mines!

name: Startup Valley Adventure - Episode 1
description: A tough divorce, getting fired from a job ... Why not make your life harder? Take on the role of a novice startup in Silicon Valley.

name: Thugs Law
description: Thugs take over the police and now the rule the city. People that not respect their law pay with their lives. Get any weapon that you have and face them. Show no mercy. They will show no mercy on you.

name: Slime Crunch
description: Slime Crunch is a 2D Platformer game where the player has one goal: Crunch slimes. Featuring 18 levels which span across six biomes, Slime Crunch provides a varied and challenging experience in every level.

name: Bhavacakra Grace
description: Will Grace succeed in her job as a mercenary?

name: Drug Dealer Simulator
description: Have you ever thought about expanding your own crime empire, without the legal and moral consequences? SIMULATE IT!. Now you will finally be able to crawl into the dark alleys of the drug dealing business! Become a street business mastermind, or a ruthless gangster - it's up to you!

name: Heart to Heart
description: Sloth: Heart to Heart is a Kinetic Visual Novel about human connection, and the lack thereof.

name: SCP: Kikan no Kanata - The Will of a Single Tale: Hon-pen - Dai 1-bu
description: "Do you believe the actuality now?" When the SCP Foundation moves, you will be a witness of {Project MA-13}.

name: Yuki's Tale
description: Yuki's Tale is an adult Yaoi JRPG inspired by Japanese anime and tells a story about a young healer named Yuki who has to face a dilemma: to get a great reward by returning to his guild or help his fellow adventurer and then turn into a hero.

name: Fighters Legacy
description: Fighters Legacy is a 1 on 1 INDIE CASUAL combat game. No flashy over the top effects, just good old fashioned fisticuffs!

name: Experience
description: Simple RPG game, the protagonist has to change his life, go down the mountain to eliminate thieves, get money, buy equipment

name: SkydiVeR
description: "All you need is 20 seconds of insane courage and I promise you something great will come of it" - B. Mee SkydiVeR is the first parachuting simulator specifically made for VR. Launch yourself into the sky like never before!

name: HopeLine
description: HopeLine is a classic theme of survival games. you need to overcome struggles such as hunger, thirst and cold,And encounter beasts and zombies. Make a fire,Build shelters. Kill animals for meat, Or you need to kill other players to protect yourself. Do everything possible to survive.

name: Bios Ex: Yami no Wakusei
description: Bios Ex is a Psychological Mystery, a Visual Novel set in the psychiatry of the suburbs of Sapporo, Japan of the 90s, inspired by the old VN like Yu-No and Policenauts....

name: Northern Lights
description: Northern Lights is a first-person survival experience in which you step into the shoes of a ranger, sent on a Siberian island to investigate the disappearance of the crew in charge with a secret facility, whose contact with homeland was lost due to abnormal weather conditions.

name: Something is Wrong
description: Sin descripción

name: Yametei
description: This is a different parkour game from the past, the game gives you a different image of the mythical animal, as well as different music.

name: Trouble Travel TT
description: An easy-to-play platformer-quest, invites the player to go through the hard way of a person who got lost in a nonexistent city. In which strange things happen. Solve riddles, keep up on time, run while you can. Perhaps you can get out.

name: Dangerous Orbit
description: Dangerous Orbit is a small, replayable, arcade game. You can fly and shoot, shoot and fly.

name: Infinite Art Museum
description: The Infinite Art Museum is the world’s largest virtual reality gallery of contemporary art - a growing collection with over 500 original paintings, illustrations and photographs from artists all over the world.

name: Two Clusters: Kain
description: Follow Kain's space adventure.

name: Space Warfare
description: 2D casual strategy

name: Castle Break
description: Arkanoid meets shooting meets building in a grand battle versus evil castles with eyes

name: VR Racing
description: Welcome to VR Racing, the one and only Racing game designed specifically for VR. Use your motion controllers to control the entire car and feel true immersion instead of the traditional gamepad controller. Featuring Online Freeroam, you can chat, show off your cars, or just hang out and chat.

name: Tobit
description: A relaxing walking simulator game with biblical narration from the book of Tobit. Relive a narrated biblical story of Tobit in an engaging forest environment.

name: Deck of Ashes
description: Deck of Ashes is an adventure game with tactical card combat. Lead the cast of antiheroes on a quest for redemption. Explore the cursed fantasy world and hunt down powerful cards. Forge a unique Battle Deck, and crush your foes! Can you rid the world of the Ash Curse?

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director
description: Spend a truly Sensational and Adventurous Summer working as Cruise Director in charge of the Americas Cruise on the super-luxurious S.S.Liberty of the Waves.

name: Ruination
description: Navigate a hostile alien world full of monstrous creatures! Battle mighty bosses! Wield a vast array of brutal weaponry! Fight your way to the core of the planet and complete your mission... or die.

name: Emotions
description: Enter the world of Rika. She sets out to meet UFOs and unrestrained people. Conquer the enigma of a crazy major. Solve the riddle to save the humanity. There should be only one reality. For nowadays and forever. But Rika has tendencies to schizophrenic emotions.

name: Bet on Man
description: Bet on one of the men and hope to be the winner... or... Choose one of the men, give him the attributes correctly and make him the winner.

name: Cartacombs
description: Buckle up, hold on tight, and don't stop shooting! Cartacombs is a 2D endless-runner/shooter. Careen through mine shafts and caverns in your cart, leaping and blasting the monsters that lurk in the deep parts of the earth. Power up your weapon and cart, and see how far you can go!

name: Flying Circus
description: Parents left sector hotel-oscar-mike-echo, we can proceed with operation Flying Circus. Lead our units to defeat the enemy, and gain control over all toys in the house.

name: Hammer & Anvil VR
description: Become the blacksmith of the village! Forge axes, dagues, spikes, shields and sword from iron sticks and other base materials.

name: Smuggle Buddies
description: Play with your friends to beat up monsters and protect your loot! Switch between different classes on the fly to fight and survive against a variety of enemies. Play locally or online in this co-op hack-and-slash action game.

name: I'm Still Here
description: You've just moved into your new apartment but something spooky is going on! Thankfully you've got the internet to help you. Search Wahoo Answers on your laptop to figure out what's going on and maybe you can be happy in your new place.

name: Jump Doper
description: Test your reflexes while playing the most dangerous game of jump rope. Mess up and you’ll get sliced, don’t get sliced too much or you’re out. Reach high scores and unlock bonuses in this twitch arcade game.

name: Infinite Children
description: Infinite Children is a science fiction audiobook video game about life extension. Every time anyone gets a Steam achievement, the game gets longer...for everyone, ever.

name: God Hand
description: You are the guardian of the town. To protect the village from endless monsters, Remove the monster to maintain the power source.

name: Jumpy Hunt
description: Colourful and innocent looking but extremly HARD. Jumpy Hunt is a fast pace skill game based on grid movement. You have one simple goal: make it to the finish as fast as you can.

name: Life One
description: This is an ordinary retro RPG, but the only difference is that your HP is 1. Although you may be confused at the beginning, you can feel fumbling around the world and make friends and items and advance quests.

name: Contact : Last Defence
description: Contact : Last Defence is a VR space action shooter. Complete missions, protect your planet and upgrade your ship. When you are done defending, take the fight to the invaders in Arcade mode and compete for a top spot on the online leaderboard!

name: Kiritan vs. Kanitan: Zunda-mochi Defense!
description: Kiritan vs Kanitan "Zunda-mochi defense!" is a 3D tower defense game of Tohoku sisters. Place cute characters on the map and protect zunda-mochi from crabs, jellyfish and other sea creatures. Play with many cute characters and find efficient strategies to beat enemies!

name: Zerone Episode 1 Gunner
description: Zerone supports up to 4 players and players can choose to collaborate by setting tactical level or play in defense mode. Players can play in a tactical manner with other players and this will bring the new experience of collaborating with other players which no other VR LBE game has provided.

name: Tofu Pudding Simulator
description: Tofu Pudding Simulator offers a wide range of ingredients to meet your needs for making your own tofu pudding. The ingredients and spices you choose will determine the taste of the tofu pudding. Sweet, salty,spicy and sour are all in your choice.

name: Car Tune: Project
description: Project Car Tune its a racing game that sets you on building & tuning your vehicles for entry-level motorsports & street racing. It's an ambitious project that welcomes all lovers of the automotive tuning scene and avid fans of racing.

name: Grounds of Glory
description: Grounds of Glory is an online arena-based PvP game. It features destructible elements, proper projectile collision and reactive spells and abilities. Its fast-paced and action-packed combat is heavily dependant on positioning, reaction speed and aiming your projectiles.

name: The Lost Light of Sisu
description: Sisu is a forgiving yet challenging physics driven platformer.

name: Synthrun
description: Synthrun is an action-platformer where you race through an abstract world. Have you got what it takes to collect all the energy orbs?

name: Drone Spektra
description: Arcade time-attack drone racing game

name: Armoured Alliance
description: Control a tank in this realtime action strategy battle to capture all the bases. Use overpowered turrets to destroy your enemies by yourself or as a team.

name: Dream Enders
description: A visual, interactive story with unique characters, consequential dialogue choices, and branching story paths set in the world of an M.M.O.R.P.G.

name: Decisions
description: This game is a choose-your-own-adventure type of game where you are put in the way of obstacles and have to stay alive!

name: Tiny Love
description: TINY LOVE! is a ride with colorful, cute main characters specially suited for introducing children to the VR realm and highly recommended for a fun family time. TINY LOVE! follows the adventure of Nefasto and Lubella who fall in love at first sight. Come experience the TINY LOVE of a life time!

name: Flappy Flappy VR
description: Flap your wings and caw like a bird as you fly through pipes and attract a flock while you journey to the north!

name: Dismantle: Construct Carnage
description: ‘Dismantle: Construct Carnage’, is a local-multiplayer arena brawler, where you can literally tear your opponents limb from limb. Feel the effects of damage as you hop, crawl and roll your way to victory, making sure your own body parts aren’t used as weapons against you.

name: Burned Land
description: Burned Land is a 4x game in which you will take control of a nascent human race and try to avoid its extinction. Build, explore, conquer until you are worthy of gods. Then confront their anger.

name: Space War Arena
description: "Direct the tides of war in lightning fast strategic battles and unleash astonishing arsenals against opposing fleets to destroy their bases and claim their space. Build an armada from 30+ different types of evolving units, unleash your cunning, adapt to the enemy, and command your fleet in epic AI encounters or vicious same-screen multiplayer. Engage!"

name: GhostGame
description: GhostGame is the roguelike bullet hell game that puts your hand-mouse coordination to the test. Fight through hordes of enemies, gain powerful skills, acquire companions and defeat bosses to accomplish your ultimate mission.

name: Pylon Racer
description: Experience the thrills of racing high power planes meters off the ground and join the elite ranks of daredevil pylon racers. Master the course, conserve energy in the turns and flip through the chicanes in the ultimate race against time.Pylon Racer - puts you back in the pilot’s seat.

name: Toridama: Brave Challenge
description: Toridama: Brave Challenge is mini game collection based on the courage test. Test your weak feeling inside of you as we say "Chicken Level" based on timing of pressing a button, level, and pitch in various kind of critical situations. Share play is available, so you can measure your "Chicken Level" with your friend. All game is playable with one button, so it is casually play with family and many friends in a party.

name: Stealth
description: Stealth is a stealth game featuring a style of near-future science fiction,where you strengthen yourself with various equipment and sneak in diversified scenes by stealth as a chivalrous bandit. Different equipment brings you different skills, which could help you deal with various tricks and enemies in different scenes.

developers.name: 珠海源构信息科技有限公司

name: Survival Journals
description: Survive with your choices and fortify your safehouse in this text based adventure. The Horde's on it's way, will you be ready when it arrives?

name: Murica
description: Get portal-napped to an alternate version of The United States 2000 years in the future. Travel the 16-bit landscape of MURICA on a search for the way home; and maybe save the past while you're at it.

name: Project Hastur
description: Defend humanity against the ever changing threat of the alien Proteans. Project Hastur combines elements of 3D tower defense and real-time strategy with models of biological evolution to create a uniquely challenging experience.

name: Roah
description: A great unknown danger is approaching Roah's home planet. Follow Roah as she explores the world and encountering all of its different factions, uncovering the mystery of what is draining the planets lifeforce.

name: Deep Sea Endurance
description: How long can you survive in the deep Sea?

name: Space Rabbits in Space
description: "Space Rabbits in Space (and everywhere else)" is a 2d parkour skill-based platformer adventure about betrayal, speed, hard love, and fun facts. Played with one hand. On a mouse. Like we stated in the short description, it's good to have a free hand for various reasons.

name: B画少说
description: Sin descripción

name: Fear Simulator
description: Fear Simulator is a unique psychological Fear game built for VR, in which there are no ghosts or blood, but only Fear scenes (including common phobias) from deep inside people's hearts, allowing players to immerse themselves and feel the Fear!

name: Cavyrn
description: Cavyrn is an Adventure RPG Rogue like set in a randomly-generated open world with wide-open deserts and plains. New surprises await around every corner in the form of challenging caves, dungeons and enemies.

name: Zombie Killer: Type to Shoot!
description: This game is a typing game, not a shooting game. Type in a word or sentence in the chest of a zombie and defeat it. Get a high score and show off your typing skills.

name: Destroy the World
description: Destroy buildings, cars, trees! Use the destructive force of nuclear power plants to your advantage! Melt the ice caps! Kill all the baby seals! Raise the ocean levels! Burn down the rain forest & destroy every cultural site in your way! Cause great oil spills and disrupt threatened ecosystems!

name: A Lullaby of Colors
description: Blissful psychedelic relaxation experience for VR. Fly through breathtakingly beautiful worlds of endless sweet-tasting colors and gentle sounds. Great for relaxing, open-eyed meditation, or jaw-dropping drug-free tripping.

name: Accel
description: To escape the cyber world of ACCEL you’ll have to go beyond your limits with your spaceship. In ACCEL we’re adding a new challenge, 360° maneuverability.

name: Killing Trials
description: Killing Trials - Platform game about testing the survival of a small organism in difficult conditions among various traps.

name: Inma Nemu no Chu-chu Seieki Tanken-ki
description: Sin descripción

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution
description: It's Time to Duel! Believe in the Heart of the Cards and Create your Legacy! Build your Deck from over 9,000 cards and take on the most iconic Duelists from the Yu-Gi-Oh! universe. Relive the stories from the original animated Yu-Gi-Oh! series through Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V, and challenge the newest generation of Duelists from the virtual world of Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS!

name: Shanky: The Vegan's Nightmare
description: Shanky - is a joyful meat grinder and mince is its movement force. Swallow up everything you can and collect Meat-Cola to stay on the move. Participate in a stunning story of love and self-sacrificing. Depending on the level, Shanky would change its movement force accessories to legs, wheels, wings and boat. During the boss battles, you would learn how to use its mince launcher. Collect Meat-Cola to expand Shanky's stomach and success is guaranteed. And remember - there is never enough mince, so keep grinding!

name: Freecell Battle King
description: Battle play is exciting ! Clear speed is the key ! Sharing one unit,two Switches or online, enjoy the fun of competition with freecell ! The tasks are 3000 questions! There are ordinary "KING Mode" and easy "MAY Mode". Collect the "collection" by clears to color the game screen. One-player is also enrichment ! There is also a mode that you can play easily. Joy - Con or play with touch ! Play with your favorite style.

name: Food Truck Tycoon
description: Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck!

name: Fractured Minds
description:
Fractured Minds is an immersive artistic short game, exploring anxiety and mental health issues.

Winner of the BAFTA Young Game Designers Award, Fractured Minds is a game created by 17-year-old Emily Mitchell, with the hope of aiding understanding and awareness of mental illness.

Embark on a journey through the human psyche and experience six atmospheric and thought-provoking chapters, each symbolising a different aspect or challenge associated with mental health issues; from isolation to anxiety, with everyday situations being distorted beyond recognition.

Raw, emotive and earnest, Fractured Minds demonstrates that video games are capable of communicating vital messages in imaginative ways. It is a game that seeks to encourage empathy and champion support for the millions living with mental health issues.

Fractured Minds is proud to support Safe in our World, a gaming industry charity striving for better mental health awareness.

name: Evoland Legendary Edition
description:
Evoland Legendary Edition is a compilation of:

- Evoland.
- Evoland II.

Evoland is a journey through the history of action/adventure gaming, allowing you to unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and graphic upgrades as you progress through the game. Inspired by many cult series that have left their mark in the RPG video gaming culture, Evoland takes you from monochrome to full 3D graphics and from active time battles to real time boss fights, all with plenty of humor and references to many classic games.

Evoland 2 graphics style is changing as you travel through time and its gameplay evolves as you move along the storyline. It is also a real RPG at heart, with a deep scenario based on time travel: explore different eras and change the history of the world. But are you sure that the consequences will not make things worse?

Full of humor and references to classic games, the Evoland series brings a truly epic and extraordinary adventure, unlike anything you’ve ever played before!

name: Chrono Clash: Fantasy Tactics
description: Chrono Clash is a blend of classic tactical roleplaying enhanced with enhanced with dynamic action sequences.

name: Gravity Ace
description: Descend into dark caverns, fly and blast your way past waves of enemies, retrieve the reactor core and make your escape, all while fighting the deadly embrace of crushing gravity.

name: Caladria Chronicles
description: Caladria Chronicles is a kinetic visual novel spanning several genres, complete with full voice acting. Follow princess Nerisu Himenomiya and her friends as they enjoy life, have crazy adventures, and maybe even save the world.

name: Ggang!
description: 'Ggang!' is a virtual reality baseball game. You can either play the game alone with an AI pitcher, or with another player using a single device.

name: Went: One Alive
description: A lonely city survived by high technology at the end of the day. A girl who can invade the brain terminal to read the mind. The myriad doubts and hidden crises caused by a small case. You need to find clues in the corners of the city. You have to look for clues in people's minds and memories.

name: TankDestruction
description: TankDestruction is a multiplayer game with a focus on fast-paced action. Select 5 special abilities and battle on large-scale maps with up to 20 other players! Destroy tiger tanks, other players, and automated turrets that stand in your way, to capture enemy towers to win the game!

name: Solitaire: Learn Chemistry!
description: A combination of using flashcards for learning with the classic card game Solitaire.

name: The Angry Banana
description: The Angry Banana is a short 2D action game with a funny story that's full of NONSENSE! You go out on a journey to avenge your "family". But, will you be able to?

name: Tokyo Snap
description: Spend a week in Tokyo to get some great photos for your feed. Learn the latest fashion trends, make friends, and take the perfect pictures to rack up likes on Street Snaps.

name: Self-Reliance
description: Self-Reliance is a live-action interactive adventure game. As the player follows the steps of the protagonist, live-action provides a vicarious thrill. The players are also able to learn accurate sexual knowledge, establishing correct attitudes and values.

name: Clam Man
description: An absurd, strange, and hilarious underwater adventure featuring THE Clam Man, duck, nasty drinks, and the horrifying reality of mayonnaise crime.

name: Sky Labyrinth
description: Sky Labyrinth is 3D Puzzle Game that escape with gravity magic. You are an inexperience witch and you can move the object and “Change the Gravity”. When you encouter a dead end, you would find the new way by changing the gravity.

name: Jungle Z
description: [Game Introduction][ Jungle Z ] On a ordinary weekend afternoon, people were enjoying a leisurely holiday. Suddenly, zombies came out from nowhere and attacking. Everyone is screaming and running, nobody knows what's going on until dead.

name: Chalkship
description: Explore the vastness of the blackboard. Skillfully maneuver your craft through the beautiful but unfriendly environments, in a graceful and majestic dance of space acrobatics. Also look out for spikes, aliens and space-worms!

name: Fantasy Island
description: This is a simple crossbar game, simple screen, simple operation. If you like simple game fun, try it out.

name: The Adventures of Jason and the Argonauts
description: This exciting Match 3 adventure game takes you on a journey beyond the edge of the world. Join ancient Greek heroes in search of the Golden Fleece.

name: Clown Thug Cop Zombies
description: One of the best games of this era. This is an intense game for intense players. WARNING: you may not be able to handle this level of intesity.

name: Super Agent: Drunk Kent
description: Super Agent: Drunk Kent is a platformer with a difference...Your drunk! Navigate challenges using your drunken reflexes and blurred sense of judgement. Utilize Super Drunk Mode to hone your drunken stupor into a kind of "slow-mo", allowing you to pass through otherwise impossible traps!

name: Yet Another Survival Game
description: A virus ravaged the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone, you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by fierce creatures!

name: Hockey Camp - Goaltender
description: Hockey Camp - Goaltender presents the opportunity to compete through a competitive goalie hockey camp. Compete against other goalies on the leaderboard to prove that you are the best at making saves! Experience high speed hockey pucks, dramatic save streaks, and desperation saves!

name: Neon Infinity
description: 80's neon drenched, couch co-op, endless high score fest, space arcade shooter!

name: Thief Simulator VR
description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a real thief? Now you can see for yourself in Thief Simulator VR! Steal in free roam sandbox neighborhoods. Observe your target and gather information that will help you with the burglary. Take the challenge and rob the best secured houses. And... don't get caught!

name: Supernatural Super Squad Fight!
description: Come join the chosen and fuel our flame against evil! Play as one of eight mighty fighters and battle across epic landscapes. Challenge the forces of darkness or oppose the forces of good. Which side will you choose?

name: Flying in Labyrinth
description: Dynamic VR runner on a flying platform controlled by the movements of your body in randomly generated labyrinths.

name: Balloon Fiesta 3D
description: Blast away all those balloons and make sure that none reaches the ceiling in this marksmanship contest

name: Fighting Spree 3D
description: Knock your opponent out or be knocked out in this kickboxing title

name: Ghost Buster 3D
description: Hunt down and zap every ghost you come across in this third person shooter

name: Repel Aliens 3D
description: Shoot down the aliens dropping from the skies and ensure that none reaches the earth's surface

name: Captain StarOne
description:
Became the hero, Captain StarONE, in this game blending action and 'inaction'. Set your strategies and combos, then multitask as the game carries out your attacks. Watch the battles unfold and be ready to jump back in to guide our hero! As enemies become stronger your strategies and actions change; you then assist the Captain for stronger moves. Make timely interventions to manipulate and generate combos, aim for major damage, strengthen equipment, organize teams and head to victory!

Get ready for a unique and comical space adventure in Captain StarOne!

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 1: A New Day
description: A New Day is the first episode of the first season of a five-part series based on the AMC TV series and the original The Walking Dead comic book series. The game is set in the United States at the start of a zombie outbreak. It takes place in the original universe but does not rely on characters or locations from the comic book or the TV series.

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 2: Starved for Help
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up three months after the events of the first one, also taking into account choices that have been made in that earlier episode. This includes statements and decisions Lee has made that characters still remember, as well as major choices such as having taking along either Doug or Carley, which alters whether they are present or not in this second episode.

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 3: Long Road Ahead
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up after the events of the previous episode. The group is still at the Travelier Motel and goes by with the supplies from the car they found, along with scavenging trips from Kenny and Lee to the city.

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 4: Around Every Corner
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up after the events of the previous episode. The train the group managed to get going arrives at Savannah, the place Clementine believes her parents are.

name: The Walking Dead: Season One - Episode 5: No Time Left
description: Just like the first episode it consists of eight chapters and it picks up after the events of the previous episode. Clem disappeared and Lee is in contact with her through the walkie-talkie, but she is not alone.

name: Perhaps When We Dream
description: Explore the dream. Lull the beast back slumber. Not every dream, but perhaps any dream.

name: Grits Racing
description: Lug-nut-challenged, crazy couch game that happens to also be the most realistic TD/2D racer to date. Stop driving tiny cars that just pivot on center. Drive tiny cars that actually steer and crash like a car.

name: Chipmonk!
description: Seek vengeance on the gluttonous gray squirrel in this retro-inspired Beat 'em up starring chipmunk warriors!

name: Blood Memery
description: Take earphones, listen to the helpless voice, listen to the angry complaint. To the left heaven to the right hell. The whole story is presented in the form of a fictional voice diary. A monologue diary is used to show you the tragic experience of a abducted girl and the painful choices it faces.

name: Unravel Cyndy
description: Unravel Cyndy is a jigsaw puzzle game, containing 64 sexy and sexual 3D CGI renders, featuring cool and relaxing gameplay.

name: Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator
description: Get behind the wheels of classic Russian locomotives and check if the wild animals, bad people, severe frosts and constantly changing weather are able to stop you. Try to survive in the longest railway line in the world!

name: Tess Elated
description: Tess Elated is an addicting Logic Puzzle game where you face off against a series of powerful female professionals. Investigate the diverse cast to discover who or what is influencing their world. Cross the line, and become... Elated!

name: Autumn's Chorus
description: Set out into the unexplored frontier land of Dorinth and make your name as a member of the Pilgrim's Guild in Autumn's Chorus; an action role playing game filled with interesting choices, exciting combat​, and memorable characters.

name: CubeRace
description: CubeRace is a fast paced competition game with unique gameplay. A 3D racing game set in 2168, on the Saturn Moons, where you have to race on a cube-shaped vehicle with no gravity, no brakes and no accelerator! Compete with other players by challenging them on Leaderboards.

name: Roidrekt
description: Fast-paced arcade action; blast to survive in the dangerous depths of space.

name: New World Horizon
description: New World Horizon is a 16th century role playing stand alone adventure for the PC. It features a massive open world to explore by land and sea for hunting, fishing, mining, lumbering, house construction and farming.

name: Candy Mandy
description: Classic game in the popular "three in a row" genre.

name: 机退怪兽
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Reds Forest Fun
description: Little Red is on her way to grandmas house, but to get there she will need your help. Help her through 480 different brain teasing puzzles to find her way through the forests.

name: The Region
description: The region is affected by an unknown virus that has destroyed almost all living things.

name: Luxury House Renovation
description: Check yourself out as a renovation crew of luxury houses. Paint, repair, build, arrange.

name: Trucking
description: Forget everything you used to know about shipping. Here you will know what real work is.

name: Column Taker
description: Column Taker a cooperative game where you try to see if your friend and you can take pieces out of a building without knocking it down

name: Hellink
description: The first visual novel about fake news! Investigate in 2044 in a humorous and cyberpunk universe. Counter your opponents' lies and thwart the plot that threatens Néo-Sorbonne!

name: Theme Park Worker
description: Theme Park Worker is a recreational park game of a new kind. An open-world game full of possibilities and details awaits you. Either choose a ride to work or just ride.

name: Wrecked Crash Simulator
description: Want to see Grandma get hit by a Semi Truck? Make it happen Want to see an old man walk into an exploding napalm canister? Make it happen Want to see an F1 car slam through a cow and ploy through a TV? Make it happen While in Early Access, the game will be updated 100% based on the community.

name: Hunting fields of Jackals
description: Drive various of real-world military vehicles that armed with real-world heavy weapons, racing and fighting against other players in a unique PVP+PVE survival mode.

name: By Moonlight
description: ~ ~ A Comedic Mystery Visual Novel with Relationship Building ~ ~ Play as a paranormal investigator hired by the paranormal to investigate! Search for a headless horseman's missing head before the night is over.

name: Ragtag
description: RagTag is a unique blend of action and strategy that puts you in control of a RagTag group of humans, mutants, animals and cyborgs as you fight from extinction across the stars. RagTag has simple mechanics that allow complex manoeuvres and trick shots to dispatch your enemy.

name: Redviil
description: Now it's 2143, my name is Alice, I was born in a small town called Gwaine. I dream to continue the work of my great-grandfather: to find a cure for the red plague and release people living in hundreds of bunkers.

name: TetrotronVR
description: Nothing can be better than well overlooked old, but in new format! TetrotronVR is completely new look at the usual. Being on the surface of Mars and have limited time you will need to fill the gaps in the wall, with the help of familiar figures in the form of square, line, letters "L" and "Z".

name: Tiny Dangerous Dungeons
description: Hop into a classic Game Boy inspired metroidvania adventure! Explore a huge and open dungeon, collect hidden power-ups and gain new skills to aid you on your quest! Can you survive the Tiny Dangerous Dungeons and find the presumably huge treasure?

name: Why Chicken? Why?
description: Which came first? The chicken or the egg? More importantly, why did the chicken cross the road? For the 25 golden eggs of course!!!

name: Dungeon Cleaning Express
description: Dungeon Cleaning Express is a 2D action platformer in which you play as a professional dungeon cleaner which uses bombs and dynamite to destroy monsters and other hostile creatures in dungeons and cellars - not that easy but almost always effective and generally lots of fun!

name: The Woods: VR Escape the Room
description: After a walk in the woods, you find yourself locked in a swaying cage above the forest floor, with no recollection of how you got there. Discover the mysteries this forest has to offer. Solve puzzles, decipher ancient texts, and uncover the mystical secrets hidden within these woods for many years.

name: Oik Memory 3
description: At the beginning of each round in a short time the game marks from 4 to 12 blocks. You need to open these blocks in the right order!

name: Valentines Cafe
description: Casual puzzle on the theme of a romantic evening in a cafe.

name: Death Waves
description: These zombies chose the wrong day to get out of their mom's hot spot. Kill them and survive to waves !

name: Firon
description: The story follows Firon in his life which takes a turn in an unexpected direction when strange things start happening in his peaceful town.

name: The Toymaker's Apprentice
description: This world is dark. The Toymaker's Apprentice has captured our citizens and enslaved us with his evil toys. Is there one amongst you brave enough to journey into his world on an unforgiving quest to end his tyranny and free so many lost souls...

name: DinoVR
description: SF Fantasy genre game that suppresses dinosaurs that have been transformed to mutant types by terrorist groups. release scheduled for February 2019!!

name: Super Nitrous Zoomer
description: Take control of an elemental zoomer and fly through this non-stop action game. It combines simple controls with challenging reflex oriented game play. As you race through the zoomer tunnel your goal is to last as long as you can while you accumulate zoomer coins.

name: Angel Light the Elven Truce
description: The elves and the dark elves need to make peace, or they will face their Doomsday. The Knight Templars are here to help them out! Many oppose peace, because they want power for their own benefit! Find out who is behind the Orc and gobos legions!

name: Toxin the Game
description: Toxin the game is a casual hardcore game. In which you are a bacterium and you only have to avoid all the soaps. The bacterium travel in Vertical sense over a person's skin avoiding the soaps that can delete it.

name: Cognition: An Erica Reed Thriller - Episode 2: The Wise Monkey
description: The Wise Monkey is the second episode in the adventure series of four installments. The story picks up right after the cliffhanger at the end of the first episode, but also introduces a new case right away. Players once again control FBI agent Erica Reed as she investigates a serial killer who removes tongues, eyes and ears of victims after killing them. In addition Reed has to deal with a new director at the office.

name: Cognition: An Erica Reed Thriller - Episode 3: The Oracle
description: The Oracle is the third episode in the adventure series of four installments. The story picks up right after the second episode, as Erica reaches the Enthon Tower where Joey was thrown off the top floor. The episode reveals the identity of both The Oracle and the Cain Killer and explains their motivations behind the murders.

name: Cognition: An Erica Reed Thriller - Episode 4: The Cain Killer
description: The final entry to the Cognition series, has Erica pursuing both Cordelia and the Cain Killer while keeping the player unaware of John's fate. Through flashbacks we learn more of Erica's past with John as FBI agents. Meanwhile Mac Adams is trying to arrest Erica and she must convince him to help her one last time. To this end the series introduces a "trust meter" which depends on Erica's actions she may be lose her former boss' trust completely.

name: Fail to Win: Chapter 1
description:
Like many games, Fail to Win allows you to return after death. Well ... it lets your avatar Everett return. This game, however, has a few ... peculiarities. Everett may be able to return to a checkpoint, but that does not mean everything else returns with him. Pull off crazy ragdoll corpse stunts and solve deadly puzzles.

This chapter should last about 30-60 minutes. It the response is positive, more will come.

name: Red Dead Redemption: Liars and Cheats
description: The Liars and Cheats pack exends the Red Dead Redemption multiplayer experience with horse races, multiplayer poker, Liar's Dice and a new Stronghold competitive mode.

name: Esper: Make You Live Again
description: Esper: Make You Live Again is a kinetic novel in which Ryo Masaki tells his story whereas he was only a young student in an Esper academy. The Espers are humans with special abilities who can, under certain circumstances, share the pain and see the past and the memories of a person.

name: Ghost Mountain
description: "Ghost Mountain" is a text-based escape game, a purely overhead world with the theme of survival and survival, around the various scenarios of thrilling horror and multi-final. The story tells of a class outing. Because the driver made the wrong way, the classmates mistakenly entered the ghost mountain.

name: Lyantei
description: Work at your aunt's inn and help your guests with their problems. Can your decisions save your aunt's livelihood or will all the labour be in vain?

name: Lgnorant girl doll
description: Lgnorant girl doll is a game of two girls traveling in a wide world. They confront a lot of trials for their own mission. One person is a calm doll girl Another person is an emotional girl They will combine power and fight against terrible enemies Through the fields and dungeons, they become stronger.

name: BFGE
description: BFGE (Bartender Flair Game)-a simulator of the bartender virtuoso.The main character is Flairbartender!!!Flair Bartender-a bartender who will prepare you a cocktail juggling shakers and bottles so that you do not even notice how you will be in front of your drink!

name: Magic Heart
description: Eva has a dream to develop magic abilities and return to her homeland, but she suddenly develops close relationships with her two female friends instead.

name: Monsters: Survival
description: You must survive among different dinosaurs and mutated mutant animals. Explore food, build shelter. Find yourself an animal to tame and go hunting. Be careful not to hunt!

name: Coloring Game
description: Coloring Game is a fantastic anti-stress game. Color pixels without any hurry while listening to beautiful background music.

name: Oliver's Adventures in the Fairyland
description: A small andventure metroidvania game, where you playing as our-time teenager, who was summoned by wizard in fantasy world! And that wizard gave him a quest - return stolen king's treasures!

name: Viking: Sigurd's Adventure
description: Viking warrior Sigurd make his way through dangers untold in a fantasy world, featuring arcade gameplay, cartoonish visuals and light-spirited game story.

name: Slashvival
description: Slashvival is a third-person action RPG with roguelite elements. Use swords to fight mutant creatures in a medieval low-poly world. Survive intense battles and rescue your family in this thrilling hack-and-slash adventure!

name: Tenebrous Dungeon
description: As a war brews over the secession of the Tenebrous Highlands from the Kingdom of Gnarmania, you must infiltrate the dungeons of Tenebrous Keep to stop a rebel lord from tearing the kingdom apart.

name: Snakebird Primer
description: The snakebirds are back, this time yellowbird joins the team on a more relaxed island with easier puzzles. A casual puzzle game for the entire family as well as a primer for the serious challenges of the original game.

name: Legal Dungeon
description: Legal Dungeon is a game about organizing police investigation documents. This game has 14 endings and 6 achievements, as well as a cute Screen Mate shop. Judge the lives of others and collect all items!

name: The Tear
description: An immersive VR adventure in a fantastic world.

name: Sky Racket
description: The universe is in peril! Two kids are chosen to hold the powerful artifact "Sky Racket" and put a stop to an evil tyrant. Play as Racket Boy or Racket Girl, and with the help of cute and strong buddies, save this nonsense dystopian pixel art universe.

name: Perspectives: Paradise
description: On November 1st, 1952, the United States detonated the world's first thermonuclear device on the Enewetak atoll in the Pacific ocean. In this VR-experience you get a front row seat of this historic test, and a look in the relevant details since then.

name: Cold Bite
description: Cold Bite is a top-down shooter in which the player fights endless waves of zombies. Build turrets, level up, and hold them off as long as you can!

name: Real Al's Humanity Academy
description: Real Al's Humanity Academy combines wacky mini game action, a bizarre sense of humor, and the world's most human robot to give you a VR party game unlike any other. There's never been a better time to learn how to be human. Enroll today!

name: Scrapyard Robot Rampage
description: Fight for the survival in a stylized world, where death is the only guarantee.

name: VRLab Academy: Anatomy VR
description: VRLab Anatomy is an interactive human anatomy atlas. Explore 8 human anatomical systems in the futuristic lab. You can see them all in the human body. All without leaving your room This application is a great learning tool, showing realistic models of human anatomy.

name: The Tenants
description: Become a landlord and deal with problematic tenants as you build your rental property empire. Decide how to react to annoyed neighbours or police interventions. Will you rent your apartment to a college couple or an older lady with four cats?

name: R.I.C.A
description: A little girl, Hinata, finding her missing cat in a mysterious and dangerous castle. This place once belonged to the famous Duke Shewell's family, but it is abandoned now. And there is a big secret hidden in this castle.

name: Terrorarium
description:
Terrorarium is an action puzzler game about wanton destruction & adorable gore across a galaxy of community-designed murder gardens. 
 
Like every great villain, you have been foiled for the last time. And this time you mean it. Those fools at the Intergalactic Horrorcultural Society have given the blue ribbon -- your blue ribbon -- to some ill-deserving pretender to the throne for too many star cycles now, and you are determined it will not happen again. This time, you're pulling out all the stops. There is no monster too deadly for you to capture, no combination of creatures too volatile for you to control. You don't care how many invasive species you have to introduce or ecosystems you have to destroy, your ambition will not be contained. You will slay the competition at any cost. 
 
Terrorarium is an 3D puzzle platformer where you play as the Gardener, a feisty granny with a chip on her shoulder, and her army of adorable, expendable Moogu. The Moogu will die frequently, breed out of control, and are often as insufferable as they are useful. 
 
In Maker Mode, you choose how the chaos unfolds. Design and publish your own levels with vicious creatures, treacherous hazards, plant monsters, lovely foliage, and destructible terrain. With these moveable, scalable, customizable assets, you can create a beautiful garden, a deadly maze or a murderous gauntlet. Hundreds of community levels have already been designed for you and you can share the levels you build with your friends and frenemies, so they too may see the horrors you have wrought.

name: Grumpy Witch
description: A 2.5D Action-Platformer with wit and charm, follow the adventures of Emilia as she Flies, Slaps, and Puzzles her way through the world of Galice! Built with love, it's a modern take on a classic genre.

name: Rainbow Dreams
description: Join Luka Sanguis, a college student unwittingly married to a Goddess, as he uncovers the mysteries of the world around him in this slice of life/comedy visual novel. Living a double life, Luka tangles with both his personal troubles as well as his role in saving the world from Daemons.

name: Tuber`s Run
description: Tuber`s Run is a runner game with unique characters. All characters has their own unique abilities and there is a level up system. Can you Run/Climb/Fight trough different game types and reach to the end?

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard EX
description: Cardfight!! Vanguard EX unveils original story with new characters. Izuru Shidou is the game's protagonist, an original new character by Cardfight's designer and franchise co-creator Akira Ito.

name: LEGO Marvel Collection
description: The LEGO Marvel Collection features three action-packed LEGO Marvel games: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes, LEGO Marvel's Avengers, and LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2, plus all season pass content for each game.

name: TwoPlay Mahjong
description: This is a Mahjong game from china.It is interesting that is used two players game mode.Game scoring rules are based on Chinese official scoring.

name: Bow to Blood: Last Captain Standing
description: Bow to Blood: Last Captain Standing is a single-player action-strategy roguelike in which you’ll oversee a flying airship in a multi-stage competition being broadcast as a deadly reality TV show. You’ll have to use keep your wits about you, as you manage your ragtag crew to keep your vessel afloat, fend off incoming attackers, gather resources, and search for treasure. Like any good reality show, forging temporary alliances is the name of the game, as players team up with NPCs to conspire against the most dominant threats. Just be aware that there’s little honor among sky pirates and only one captain will be crowned victorious.

name: Pro Fishing Simulator: Predator Edition
description: Pro Fishing Simulator is an authentic sport fishing simulation for both beginners and avid anglers. Freely explore the most beautiful fishing spots in the world and reel in the best catches by combining technique and the best official equipment.

name: Guacamelee! One-Two Punch Collection
description: Guacamelee! One-Two Punch Collection includes both Guacamelee! Super Turbo Championship Edition and Guacamelee! 2, an exclusive two-sided poster, a complete instruction manual, and download codes for two soundtracks.

name: War Thunder: Ground Forces
description: Gaijin Entertainment will be bringing its military MMO game War Thunder: Ground Forces to the PS4 leading historical battles not only in the sky but also in land and sea. War Thunder: Ground Forces is from the renowned War Thunder series that gave fans and enthusiasts a next generation MMO combat game devoted to World War II. With military aviation, armored vehicles, and fleets, gamers can take part in massive online battles, fighting with real players all over the world.

name: Unravel: Yarny Bundle
description: Discover the delightful adventures of Unravel and Unravel Two, with the Unravel Yarny Bundle.

name: Starborn Space
description:
I would love, if you try it out and give me some feedback. Greetings, mozzi. 
 
Will be soon in the Steam Store..., i hope people will like it. 
 
Welcome to Starborn Space, a space conquest game! Do not try to die in this nerve-wracking game! 
The one-of-a-kind control lets you flit around in space, and you'll encounter opponents you can barely avoid. Are you strong enough? Try your luck at Starborn Space!

name: Cgencore
description: Become the Crypto Tycoon! The more you click, the richer you get. Your goal is to collect as much Crypto as you can, buy as much tech as you can and conquer the world!

name: Noa Noa!
description:
Welcome to Noa Inc, employee! Here, you will find, hatch, and raise Noas, which are rare digital creatures with quirky personalities and mysterious abilities! Explore many different locations, find lots of Noa eggs to hatch new and unique noas, and care for some of the cutest creatures you'll ever meet.
So what are you waiting for, employee? Get to work!
Noa Noa is a virtual pet collector where you can raise, interact with, and play with more than 30 cute and bubbly digital creatures.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance - Band of Bastards
description: The roads around Rattay are far from safe, so Sir Radzig Kobyla has enlisted the help of an old acquaintance, the impoverished but wily Baron Kuno of Rychwald, and his infamous mercenary band. Radzig sends Henry to guide the band around the territory... and to keep their unbridled appetite for trouble in check. They set out to patrol the province and soon discover that Radzig's sworn enemies from long ago have come to settle old accounts. The rival bands engage in a tit-for-tat war that finally culminates in an inevitable showdown.

name: Asgard's Wrath
description: Unleash the wrath of the Gods in a mythical Norse adventure that can only unfold in VR. Forge your destiny as both a mortal hero and living god in an action role playing game of unworldly depth.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization II: Conflicts in Civilization
description: An expansion pack to Sid Meier's compelling strategy game Civilization II, the rare Scenario Disk Conflicts in Civilization includes 20 bonus scenarios, including eight "Best of the Net" scenarios created by fans of the series.

name: The End of Us
description: Circling chasing bumping leading caretaking racing following friendling crashing bouncing rushing thriving finally understanding dying

name: Freedom Bridge
description: A very small notgame about Freedom Bridge, in Korea.

name: Lizardquest-Alien waters
description: This game is an Adventure game with a Role playing in the beautiful world of the Lizard.

name: Ring of Pain
description: Ring of Pain is a roguelike card game in a world distorted by your mind... - Frail and fragile bear the curse, through the shadow you traverse - Darkness favours cunning few, stare too long and be consumed...

name: BorderStrain
description: Explore the world of Pangea as you embark on your adventure in this Open-World 2D ARPG. Follow and unravel the fate of the Firstborne or craft your own destiny alone or with friends with full multiplayer support.

name: Lily of the Hollow
description: Sin descripción

name: Rival Nation Wars
description: Rival Nation Wars is a 1 or 2 player real time strategy game in which you research technologies, build buildings, and manage your workforce, in order to purchase the weapons you'll need to defeat your enemy before it defeats you.

name: Micro Mayhem
description: Local multiplayer game: challenge your friends, lots of fun guaranteed! 6 game modes, 3 vehicles and 18 different maps.

name: Soccering
description: Soccering is a physics-based game where the objective is to control a sphere throughout the field and make the ball go inside of your opponent goal.

name: The Floor Is Really Cheap Lava
description: Avoid randomly placed lava squares as you move faster and faster down 'The Floor of Lava'.

name: A Story of Us: Ep. 1 - First Memories
description: What's the true story ? The task to find it, it's yours !

name: 2D Zombie Survival
description: 2D Zombie Survival is a very simple game of survival, in which you will have to defend yourself and survive zombie hordes.

name: Spattle Cats
description: That's right! Welcome to Spattle Cats, an action packed fun filled physics game. Take control of your spattle ship and use momentum, timing, and reflexes to pound the friskiness out of the enemy Spattle Cats.

name: Axe Prime
description: Axe Prime is a medieval / fantasy fighting game There are 6 levels each level gets progressively harder

name: Magic Factory
description: Sin descripción

name: No Love
description: NO LOVE! An RPG where you try to stop the being Darkness from destroying the world, in hopes of saving the innocent and the ones you love! A game about the human condition.

name: The Savior's Gang
description: In The Savior's Gang, the player controls The Savior, a powerful entity that is crucified and trapped between the world of mortals and heaven. This unfair death triggers the wrath of his father, an almighty pidgeon, which unleashes a series of traps, disasters and dangers all over the world. The Savior must negotiate with his Father to stop these catastrophes and save only his worshippers from all these evils and, try to get out of limbo and recover his power. To achieve his goals, he will have his good friend Stan (he hates to be called Satan) and the intermediation of his Mother and Stepfather.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Puzzle Bobble 2
description: Puzzle Bobble 2 is an action puzzle game released by Taito in 1995 as the second sequel of Puzzle Bobble. Bub and Bob, the bubble spitting dragons from the action game are back again to take on new challenges! Skillfully bounce bubbles off the walls, make chains, and erase them! Aim for even greater chains with the new Star Bubbles and Metal Bubbles! The "ACA Neo Geo" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Neo Geo masterpieces.

name: Age of Solitaire
description: Build up a magical kingdom by playing solitaire! Accrue gold, gather relics, and fight off monsters all by playing through different arrangements of solitaire with detailed backgrounds and helpful items.

name: Faraway 4
description: Escape the all-new set of locations in Faraway 4: Ancient Escape, full of complex puzzles and a great new environment ready to be explored. This room escape game will challenge your puzzle solving and adventuring ability. Prequel to one of the all-time best escape games with over a million players! Dive into a captivating gaming challenge that will give you hours of mobile gameplay.

name: Chernobylite
description:
Chernobylite is a science-fiction survival horror experience, mixing the free exploration of its disturbing world with challenging combat, unique crafting, and non-linear storytelling. Play as a physicist, one of the Chernobyl Power Plant's ex-employees, and investigate the mysterious disappearance of your beloved. Try to survive and reveal the contamination zone's twisted secrets. Remember, the military presence is not your only concern.
